title: The PPR Court Order Information Schema

courtName.description: The name of the court that issued the court order.

courtRegistry.description: The location of the court that issued the order. If someone needs to request a copy of the court order, this is where they will find it.

fileNumber.description: The court assigns each court order a unique file number up to 20 characters in length.

orderDate.description: The date of the court order in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD.

effectOfOrder.description: A brief note to explain the purpose of the Court Order.
